devdoc.details: Controller contract for Prime Pools is based on the convex Booster.sol contract

params._gauge: The address of the gauge controller
params._lptoken: The address of the lp token

params._amount: The amount of lp tokens to be deposited
params._pid: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into
params._stake: bool for wheather the tokens should be staked

params._pid: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into
params._stake: bool for wheather the tokens should be staked

params._pid: the id of the pool where lp tokens are held

params._rfactory: The address of the reward factory
params._sfactory: The address of the stash factory
params._tfactory: The address of the token factory

params._feeM: The address of the fee manager

params._platformFee: The amount to set for the platform fees
params._profitFee: The amount to set for the profit fees

params._owner: The address of the owner of the contract

params._poolM: The address of the pool manager

params._rewards: The address of the rewards contract

params._treasury: The address of the treasury contract

params._voteDelegate: The address of whom votes will be delegated to

params._pid: The id of the pool to shutdown

shutdownSystem().details: This shuts down the contract, unstakes and withdraws all LP tokens

params._amount: amount of LP tokens to withdraw
params._pid: The pool id to withdraw lp tokens from
The pool id to withdraw lp tokens from

params._amount: amount of LP tokens to withdraw
params._pid: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into

devdoc.title: Controller contract

claimRewards(uint256,address).notice: claims rewards from a specific pool

deposit(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: deposits an amount into a specific pool, mints reward tokens and stakes them into the reward contract

depositAll(uint256,bool).notice: deposits and stakes all LP tokens

earmarkFees().notice: claims fees from the feeDistro contract, transfers the lockfees into the rewards contract

earmarkRewards(uint256).notice: external function that claims rewards from a pool and disperses them to the rewards contract

poolLength().notice: returns the length of the pool

rewardClaimed(uint256,address,uint256).notice: callback function that gets called when a reward is claimed and recieved

setFactories(address,address,address).notice: sets the reward, token, and stash factory addresses

setFeeInfo(address).notice: sets the address of the feeToken

setFees(uint256,uint256).notice: sets the lock, staker, caller, platform fees and profit fees

shutdownPool(uint256).notice: shuts down a currently active pool

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: withdraws lp tokens from the pool

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: withdraws all of the lp tokens in the pool

withdrawTo(uint256,uint256,address).notice: withdraws LP tokens and sends rewards to a specified address
